Installing Orfeo Toolbox and Monteverdi on OSX

Posted on May 13, 2016

The Orfeo ToolBox (OTB) is an open-source C++ library for processing of remote sensing image, and it is shipped with Monteverdi, an end-users oriented software for for classical remote sensing tasks. With the recent release of OTB version 5.4, I decided to make this brief post on how to get... [Read More]

Posted on May 1, 2016

Posted on December 15, 2015

Working with Digital Elevation Models (DEMs) have became a standard practice in scientific disciplines related to the physical environment, from geomorphology, geology, to biogeography and climate modeling.
